main event: On 27 April 1952, at 1100 hours, a civilian observed a small white object resembling a paper plate in the sky over Royal Oak, Michigan.
interesting points: The object appeared very high in the sky and was stationary., The observer described the object as turning sideways., The sighting lasted only a few moments before the observer went to get binoculars., Upon returning, the object was no longer visible., The observer attempted to call a neighbor to witness the sighting, but the neighbor could not see it.
sighted object: small white object resembling a paper plate
